general_advisory: The weather forecast indicates light rainfall with generally cloudy to overcast skies. Maximum temperature will range between 31-32°C and minimum temperature between 20-24°C. Maximum relative humidity is expected to be 95% and minimum relative humidity 58% in the next five days.

advisory: If Zinc sulphate (ZnSO4) has not been applied during final land preparation, then Zn-EDTA @ 0.5 g/liter of water can be applied at 30 and 45 days after transplanting.
The rest amount of fertilizer (nitrogen and phosphorus) that was not applied during basal should be applied in split dose now.
To control pod borer, apply Flubendiamide 20%WG @150gram/ha along with 500lt of water.
To control blast disease, spray Hexaconazole or Tricyclazole@0.7gram/liter at 15 days interval regularly.
To control fall army worm, use 10-12 bird perches per acre and remove before tasselling.
Spray Emamectin Benzoate 5 % S.G @ 80 -gram/acre or Chlorantraniliprole 18.5% S.C @ 80-ml/acre by mixing in 200-litre of water.
To manage stem weevil, install pheromone traps @ 10/acre.
Dip the banana stem in warm water for 30 minutes before planting.
Sanitize the field and remove the infected plants.
Cattle should be dewormed at regular time intervals and vaccinated properly.
Clean the water before releasing the fishes.
Apply lime 5-10kg/ha according to the size of the pond.
